entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries and then to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:24 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
